name: A 3D Game Demo
description:
Note that this game was made in under 12 hours.

Normal controls: WASD and Mouse (or left and right arrows for turning).                            

Shift for running and left mouse button to shoot.

Doom style controls: Left and right arrows for turning and up and down arrows for 

moving. Shift to run and CTRL or E for running.

Joystick support: Move with left stick, look with right stick, shoot with A or X,           

and run by pressing left stick.
